about_the_game:
Silhouette: Chapter One is a First-Person, Story-driven, Detective Adventure Game where you take control of Jim Grayson, a homicide detective hunting an as yet unknown serial killer whose motives are confusingly unclear.

The 'Silhouette: Chapter One' demo includes a look at the first crime scene for the game entitled "Mission Zero". The demo features between 20 - 40 minutes of game-play and showcases the core functionality of the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
Although Silhouette has not been rated by any software ratings board, It is intended for Mature Audiences (17+) due to depictions of the following:
Intense Cartoon Violence
Blood and Gore
Sexual Violence
Alcohol Reference
Mild Language
